title: (re)alligning with Ethereum: From L1 to L2
description:
In this round table, three L2 chain co-founders and I will explore the rational and tangible pros and cons of (re) launching an Ethereum L2. We'll explore the why and how of launching an Ethereum L2 from a technical and ecosystem perspective.  

Tentative panel participants (I'll coordinate with them to confirm)
Rene Reinsberg or Marek Olszewski, Co-founder Celo (From EVM L1 to EVM L2)
Max Kordek, Co-founder Lisk (From non-EVM L2 to EVM L2)
James Ross, Founder Mode (From no chain to EVM L2)
